AI Description: libsodium is a modern, easy-to-use software library for encryption, decryption, signatures, password hashing, and more. It is a portable, cross-compilable, installable, packageable fork of NaCl, a highly respected cryptographic library developed by Daniel J. Bernstein.
Core Features: Some of the core features of libsodium include high-speed and high-security cryptographic operations, easy-to-use API for developers, resistance against side-channel attacks, support for multiple platforms and programming languages, constant-time implementations, and continuous security audits.
